title: 豆宝DAU破亿，成为字节跳动有史以来推广成本最低的产品
description: 豆宝成为字节跳动历史上以最低推广成本实现DAU破亿的产品。
titleZh: 豆宝DAU破亿，成为字节跳动有史以来推广成本最低的产品
titleEn: Doubao's DAU Surpasses 100 Million, Becoming ByteDance's Product with the Lowest Ever Promotion Costs to Reach This Milestone
descriptionZh: 豆宝成为字节跳动历史上以最低推广成本实现DAU破亿的产品。
descriptionEn: Doubao has become the product in ByteDance's history with the lowest promotion costs to achieve a Daily Active User (DAU) count exceeding 100 million. Despite maintaining a relatively low profile in AI product promotion without large-scale marketing campaigns, Doubao has demonstrated strong user retention. Meanwhile, Tencent's Yuanbao invested heavily in promotion during the first half of 2025, with cumulative spending nearing 6 billion yuan, and once topped the free app download charts on China's App Store. Following Alibaba's launch of its AI-to-C initiative, products like Qianwen have also ramped up their promotional efforts, with Qianwen's monthly active users rapidly surpassing 30 million.

title: 中国人工智能崛起的隐秘战线
description: 过去一年，中国人工智能产业快速崛起。
titleZh: 中国人工智能崛起的隐秘战线
titleEn: The Hidden Front in the Rise of Chinese AI
descriptionZh: 过去一年，中国人工智能产业快速崛起。
descriptionEn: Over the past year, China's AI industry has rapidly ascended. NVIDIA CEO Jensen Huang has repeatedly emphasized the concept of "sovereign AI," advocating for nations to establish independent AI infrastructure. As a pioneer among Chinese AI companies, SenseTime has not only achieved significant milestones in AI model innovation but is also dedicated to building a localized AI industry ecosystem. By constructing its own ultra-large-scale AI infrastructure, the "AI Data Center," and collaborating with domestic chip manufacturers, SenseTime has advanced the autonomy and controllability of AI computing power. SenseTime's "trinity" strategy encompasses infrastructure, productized models, and application deployment, with its open-source projects like LightX2V and the NEO architecture gaining international attention.

descriptionEn: Doubao's user growth and marketing expenses are the lowest among all ByteDance products that have ever achieved a DAU exceeding 100 million.
